dialogue.speaker: Laura
dialogue.text: Welcome to the mysterious mansion, I'm Laura. I've been trapped here for weeks.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: What's going on? How did you end up here?

dialogue.speaker: Laura
dialogue.text: I was invited to a party, but when I arrived, the doors were locked and I couldn't find anyone. Now I'm stuck.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Suddenly, you hear a strange noise coming from upstairs...
